mdRecord.dcterms:title: Epperly / Hatcher Family Group
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Epperly/Hatcher Family Group outside a house. People included in the photograph are as follows: Epperly: Mr. & Mrs.William Epperly (center standing), Mr. & Mrs. William (Bill) Hatcher (bottom left), Mr. & Mrs. Henry Hatcher (bottom far right), Addie, Emma, and Ocie Hatcher (second row far left to r.)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Hatcher, William E. (William Eldridge), 1834-1912
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
